name: Dream Lady
description:
• Controls: Keyboard. If the buttons do not work, try clicking inside the game window. In rare cases, you may need to refresh the page.
  • Graphics: I drew and animated everything myself!
  • Voice Acting: I did the voice acting myself!
  • Music: The music in the dream world is "Aurora", by Scott Buckley, https://www.scottbuckley.com.au/ . The other themes are from Pixabay, "Simple Piano Melody" and "Inspiring Cinematic" by ZakharValaha
  • SFX: Sound effects are from mixkit.co and Pixabay.
  • Ages: Everyone

The main character is named JJ. To learn more about her, you can play JJ (about 1 hour), or find some of my other short stories about her (5-15 minutes) on my itch.io page!
